clusters.description: 15-minute Bitcoin price direction markets with tight resolution windows
Over/under markets on total kills in specific games of esports matches
Basketball player prop bets (points, rebounds, spreads)
Binary yes/no on whether crypto reaches specific price by date
Binary winner markets for CS:GO and Dota 2 matches
Low-volume niche markets (music charts, weather, stock ranges)

pattern_analysis.description: Bitcoin 15-minute direction markets behave near-randomly with slight momentum bias
pattern_analysis.trading_insight: These markets resolve to extremes (0.00 or near 1.00) but show unclear mid-period signals. Short-term momentum might provide tiny edge but transaction costs likely eliminate profit. Pattern: NO CLEAR EDGE
risk_factors: Extremely short time horizons make informed betting difficult

pattern_analysis.description: Kill total over/under markets show pattern of lines being set too high

win_rate_pattern.observed_under_bias: YES - 4 out of 6 resolved to NO (under)

pattern_analysis.trading_insight: UNDER bias detected: 4/6 markets resolved NO (under the total). Lines may be set high to attract over-bettors. Strategy: Bet UNDER on kill totals in opening, especially if line looks aggressive. Monitor in-game pace.
risk_factors: Team composition effects on kill pace

pattern_analysis.description: Basketball player props show consistent UNDER bias, all 3 sampled resolved NO
pattern_analysis.trading_insight: STRONG UNDER SIGNAL: 3/3 player props resolved under. Lines likely set optimistically. Strategy: Default to UNDER on player props unless strong contrary evidence. Best edge in rebounds/assists vs points.

pattern_analysis.description: Multi-day crypto price threshold markets resolved NO (price didn't reach level)

win_rate_pattern.observed_bear_bias: YES - 2 out of 2 resolved NO (price didn't reach)

pattern_analysis.trading_insight: Markets priced bullish thresholds as unlikely (0.0005-0.61 range) and were correct. In bear/neutral periods, fade optimistic price targets. Edge exists in correctly reading macro sentiment.
risk_factors: Small sample in specific market period

pattern_analysis.description: Esports match winner markets show favorite bias - both resolved NO (favorite won)
pattern_analysis.trading_insight: Favorites won both observed matches. Underdogs may be overvalued by casual bettors. Strategy: Bet favorites in high-stakes tournament matches where skill differential is clear.

pattern_analysis.description: Low-volume niche markets (music, weather, narrow stock ranges) - no systematic patterns
pattern_analysis.trading_insight: No systematic edge. These require domain expertise (knowing Spotify chart dynamics, weather models, etc.). AVOID unless you have specific knowledge advantage.

high_confidence_edges.implementation: Bet UNDER on basketball player props, especially rebounds/assists

medium_confidence_edges.implementation: Bet UNDER on esports kill totals when lines look aggressive
Fade bullish crypto price targets in neutral/bear markets

avoid_patterns.reason: Near-random outcomes, high noise, no clear edge after costs
Requires specialist knowledge, poor liquidity, wide spreads

general_under_bias.observation: Strong UNDER bias across multiple categories (player props, esports kills, crypto prices)
general_under_bias.hypothesis: Polymarket participants may be optimistic/entertainment-biased, preferring 'exciting' outcomes (high scores, price moons). This creates systematic mispricing toward UNDER.
general_under_bias.suggested_strategy: Default to UNDER positions in over/under markets unless strong contrary signal

resolution_sharpness.observation: All markets show binary collapse pattern - prices move sharply to 0.00 or 1.00 near resolution
resolution_sharpness.implication: Early positioning is critical. Markets become efficient very close to resolution. Entry timing matters more than exit timing.
resolution_sharpness.suggested_strategy: Enter positions 2-24 hours before event, avoid trading in final hour

volume_patterns.observation: High-volume markets (>1M) show more efficient pricing than low-volume (<200K)
volume_patterns.implication: Edge opportunity inverse to volume. Best opportunities in 200K-1M volume range.
volume_patterns.suggested_strategy: Filter for medium-volume markets where information edge can overcome liquidity costs

priority_strategies.entry_signal: Default UNDER unless player averaging >120% of line in last 5 games
UNDER when line is in top 30% of historical kill totals for that game type
Fade YES when target is >10% above current price in neutral sentiment periods

limitations: All markets in sample resolved to NO (0.00) or binary extremes - may indicate biased sample or resolution reporting issue
Small sample size (20 markets) limits confidence in patterns
Single time period (late Jan-early Feb 2026) may not generalize
No access to intra-market price movements - only opening/closing ranges
strengths: Diverse market types allow cross-pattern identification
Volume data available for liquidity assessment
Clear resolution outcomes enable pattern validation
Real historical data avoids backtest overfitting
next_steps: Expand sample size to 100+ markets per cluster
Get tick-by-tick price data for entry/exit timing optimization
Correlate with external data (actual player stats, crypto prices) to verify edge mechanisms
Test strategies on Agent 2-5 market sets for pattern confirmation
